| HistoryText             = 
[[File:Brute Force Vol 1 1.jpg|left|thumb]]
'''Project Brute Force''', was spearheaded by [[Randall Pierce (Earth-616)|Dr. Randall Pierce]] as part of '''[[Weapon II]]'''.{{r|Wolverine & Captain America: Weapon Plus Vol 1 1}} The project was created in conjunction of [[Multicorp (Earth-616)|Multicorp]] owned by [[Adam Frost (Earth-616)|Adam Frost]]. Frost had plans to create cybernetically enhanced soldiers using animals. Multicorp hoped to use the team as its own private attack force.{{r|Brute Force Vol 1 1}}

The prototype team [[Heavy Metal (Animals) (Earth-616)|Heavy Metal]] was abducted by "fast food clowns," so Multicorp create Brute Force to retrieve them.{{r|Brute Force Vol 1 1}}
 
Another of the subjects in the program was designated [[Weapon II (Earth-616)|Weapon II]], he was a cybernetically enhanced squirrel with Wolverine like claws. He was captured by [[Shannon Sugarbaker (Earth-616)|Shannon Sugarbaker]] to be used in her hunting tournament of anthropomorphic animals.{{r|Unbeatable Squirrel Girl Vol 2 6}}

[[James Howlett (Earth-616)|Wolverine]] and [[Steven Rogers (Earth-616)|Captain America]] investigated an abandoned Weapon Plus site where they found the team kept in hibernation tanks full of liquid. The [[Wreckless (Earth-616)|bear]] was freed from his container and attacked the duo. It was revealed he was being mind controlled by another super-soldier, "[[Adam (Weapon VI Upgrade) (Earth-616)|Adam]]." The two heroes were forced to kill the bear in the process.{{r|Wolverine & Captain America: Weapon Plus Vol 1 1}}
